DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to gain better understanding of how the immune system works in twins with and without allergic disease. Healthy volunteers are not specifically targeted. Healthy non-allergic study participants may be found through the course of evaluation for the presence of allergies.
DOC.brief_title: Understanding and Diagnosing Allergic Disease in Twins
DOC.criteria: Twin participants ages 0 to 80 years who are with or without allergy disease. Patients with special risks attendant to venipuncture will be excluded.
